name: Zap Zone
overview: Released in Scene World #27, this game by Richard Bayliss is the final build of a game tutorial launched for Scene World issue 27 (You can download the source and data from the Scene World). In this game, you must fight your way through formation after formation of aliens. Avoid getting smashed by them, and also score as many points as you can. There are 20 different alien formation which to battle against. Can you beat your own high scores? Good luck.
